programme.title: Accomplice to Murder, With Vinnie Politan
programme.sub-title: KY v. Monroe - Bourbon, Bullets, And Betrayal
programme.desc: Vicki and Gerald Monroe's dream of owning and operating a Louisville bar together came to a tragic end when Vicki found her husband shot dead and the cash register emptied in an apparent robbery.

programme.title: Accomplice to Murder, With Vinnie Politan
programme.sub-title: FL v. Malarik - The Winn Dixie Murder
programme.desc: When Sherri Malarik is found dead in a Winn-Dixie parking lot, police suspect her husband Greg is involved; but it takes twenty years and the confession of his accomplice and former lover Jennifer Spohn to finally charge him with murder.

programme.title: Accomplice to Murder, With Vinnie Politan
programme.sub-title: FL v. Larzelere :The Root of Evil
programme.desc: After a masked man shot dentist Norman Larzelere who dies in the arms of his hysterical wife Virginia, police initially suspect a robbery gone wrong; a friend of Virginia's oldest son Jason reveals a twisted plot.

programme.title: FL v. Dalia Dippolito
programme.desc: The jury weighed the credibility of the state's key witness, Michael Dippolito, the defendant's husband.

programme.title: FL v. Dalia Dippolito
programme.desc: The Defense challenged Michael's credibility and tried to argue that Michael had a manipulative role in this alleged murder-for-hire plot.

programme.title: FL v. Dalia Dippolito
programme.desc: The jury heard details about the cash flow during Dalia and Michael Dippolito's relationship.

programme.title: FL v. Dalia Dippolito
programme.desc: Michael Dippolito waived his attorney-client privilege so the lawyer could testify.

programme.title: FL v. Dalia Dippolito
programme.desc: Jurors heard from Michael Dippolito's former attorney, who represented him during the time he was arrested for defrauding investors and grand theft.

programme.title: FL v. Dalia Dippolito
programme.desc: The state argued that the money trail of Michael Dippolito's financial transactions lea him to be the target of his wife's murder plot.

programme.title: FL v. Dalia Dippolito
programme.desc: Michael claimed drugs were planted in his vehicle and his money was stolen.

programme.title: FL v. Dalia Dippolito
programme.desc: Michael Dippolito explained to jurors what he had to deal with when he found out his wife had allegedly tried to hire a hitman to kill him and make it look like a robbery.

programme.title: Pilot Triple Murder Trial
programme.desc: Jurors learn about the court-martial trial that Kit Martin had coming up after his three neighbors were shot to death; prosecutors allege that Calvin Phillips, one of the victims, was killed because he was going to testify against the defendant.

programme.title: Pilot Triple Murder Trial
programme.desc: The first family members of Kit Martin take the stand; his stepchildren testify about events of the day of the three homicides; the prosecution is focused on challenging Kit Martin's alibi for the time that his three neighbors were shot.

programme.title: Pilot Triple Murder Trial
programme.desc: The defendant's fiancée tells jurors about the events of the day Kit Martin's three neighbors, a married couple and a man, were all shot to death; she was living in the same house as Martin with her two kids.

programme.title: Pilot Triple Murder Trial
programme.sub-title: Neighbors Point The Finger At Kit Martin
programme.desc: Prosecutors call in friends and neighbors of the three shooting victims in this case; a close friend of the Phillips family testifies that he claimed that if he died or went missing, Martin was the guy to look into.

programme.title: Pilot Triple Murder Trial
programme.desc: The friends of Calvin and Pamela Phillips take the stand testifying to the fact that they saw a worrisome, stressed-out Calvin in the days leading up to his and his wife's murder; Pamela Phillips' co-worker testifies.

programme.title: Pilot Triple Murder Trial
programme.desc: Prosecutors go back to residents of the small town where three of the defendant's neighbors were shot and killed; one of them heard an explosion and saw smoke coming from a car; inside the car were the dead bodies of two of the victims.

programme.title: Killer Or Cover-Up Murder Trial
programme.desc: Cross-examination continues on a police sergeant, who along with his commanding Lieutenant arrived on the scene where John O'Keefe's body was found unresponsive in a pile of snow; investigators immediately searched the area looking for clues.

programme.title: Killer Or Cover-Up Murder Trial
programme.desc: A police sergeant testifies outside the presence of the jury; he breaks down his relationship with the Albert family who were members of law enforcement; John O'Keefe's body was found unconscious in front of the Albert home in Canton, Mass.

programme.title: Killer Or Cover-Up Murder Trial
programme.desc: During cross-examination, the defense brings up the incident report done by the police sergeant; after Sergeant Goode wraps up his testimony another lengthy hearing takes place outside the jury's presence.

programme.title: Killer Or Cover-Up Murder Trial
programme.desc: Jurors learn about how the police began their investigation into the death of John O'Keefe; police answers the question that jurors will later answer in their deliberations.

programme.title: Killer Or Cover-Up Murder Trial
programme.sub-title: Excluding the House From the Investigation
programme.desc: The defense has more questions for a police lieutenant who was among local law enforcement officials who arrived at the scene where John O'Keefe was found unresponsive; questioning why the house was excluded from the investigation.

programme.title: Killer Or Cover-Up Murder Trial
programme.desc: Another veteran lieutenant from Canton, Mass. PD takes the stand; Charles Ray arrived much later than the other police officers who responded to the discovery of John O'Keefe in a pile of snow during a snowstorm.

programme.title: Accomplice to Murder, With Vinnie Politan
programme.sub-title: TN v. Turner: The Deadly Game
programme.desc: The murder of hometown NBA player, Lorenzen Wright remains unsolved until alleged accomplice Jimmy Martin reveals the location of the murder weapon, implicating Wright's ex-wife Sherra and her yardman Billy Ray Turner.

programme.title: Accomplice to Murder, With Vinnie Politan
programme.sub-title: FL v. Schulhoff: Romeo and Juliet in Central Florida
programme.desc: In a modern-day tale of Romeo and Juliet with a Florida twist, high schoolers Courtney Schulhoff and Michael Morin find solace in each other amidst a tumultuous family life; when their families force them apart the couple's desperation turns deadly.
